Server restarts are done at the admin's discretion.
For more info please see the map

Team killing is against the rules!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and say sorry, otherwise they will mark you as team-killer and you will get kicked.

1. Keep bad language to a minimum. If you have a problem with another player, take it to direct.
2. NO VOIP IN GLOBAL. Use the channels or Teamspeak!.
3. Team killing when you are in BLUFOR or OPFOR is forbidden and punishable. Play as Independent if you want to be free for all.
4. Revealing information about your (ex)team to other teams is lame and not appreciated
5. Do not exploit R3F or any other add-ons or you will be banned.
6. Using or spamming with loud\long custom sound commands will cause punishment up to permanent ban
